body_html:
Is there a caffe2 folder in /home/mkyang/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ ?
If not, is there a caffe2 folder in /usr/local/ ?

If there's a caffe2 folder in both places, then delete the caffe2 and caffe folder in /usr/local/ .
If there's no caffe2 in either location then how did you install Caffe2?
If there is a caffe2 folder in either location then

  • remove /home/mkyang/caffe2/build/caffe2 from $PATH
  • remove /home/mkyang/caffe2/build/lib from $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
  • remove /home/mkyang/caffe/python and /home/mkyang/caffe2/build from $PYTHONPATH

Are you using the code in the pytorch repo https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch ?
body_text:
Is there a caffe2 folder in /home/mkyang/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ ?
If not, is there a caffe2 folder in /usr/local/ ?
If there's a caffe2 folder in both places, then delete the caffe2 and caffe folder in /usr/local/ .
If there's no caffe2 in either location then how did you install Caffe2?
If there is a caffe2 folder in either location then

remove /home/mkyang/caffe2/build/caffe2 from $PATH
remove /home/mkyang/caffe2/build/lib from $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
remove /home/mkyang/caffe/python and /home/mkyang/caffe2/build from $PYTHONPATH

Are you using the code in the pytorch repo https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch ?
body:
Is there a `caffe2` folder in `/home/mkyang/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/` ?
If not, is there a `caffe2` folder in `/usr/local/` ?

If there's a `caffe2` folder in both places, then delete the `caffe2` and `caffe` folder in `/usr/local/` .
If there's no `caffe2` in either location then how did you install Caffe2?
If there is a `caffe2` folder in either location then 
- remove `/home/mkyang/caffe2/build/caffe2` from `$PATH`
- remove `/home/mkyang/caffe2/build/lib` from `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH`
- remove `/home/mkyang/caffe/python` and `/home/mkyang/caffe2/build` from `$PYTHONPATH`

Are you using the code in the pytorch repo https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch ?
